title: Ship carrying 3,700MT LP gas to arrive today: LITRO
body_lines: One of the two gas shipments to reach the country today, the Litro Gas Lanka Ltd said.
They said the ship freighting 3,700MT of cooking gas to enter the ports today.
The second gas ship is expected to berth in on Thursday (19), the company said.
However, Litro Gas had announced that it was absurd for the people to stand in queues as they did not have gas to supply for domestic needs. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
